ygData.subject: RE: Pugius Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: The Pugius dagger can be looted off a Lesser Blade Fiend in Unrest.  The stats you listed (6 DAM/ 23 DLY) are the stats for a dragoon dirk.  I think the stats
ygData.messageBody:
The Pugius dagger can be looted off a Lesser Blade Fiend in Unrest. The
stats you listed (6 DAM/ 23 DLY) are the stats for a dragoon dirk. I think
the stats for a Pugius dagger are 5 DAM 21 DLY (thats off the top of my head
but I can't remember for certain). I had one a long time ago so its
possible the stats on it got improved after I sold it.

Galtin of E'ci

> I acquired a Pugius dagger quite some time ago from a friendly bard for
> only
> 25pp. It's stats are 6dam 23 delay magic peircing. Its damage ratio is
> just a little bit better than a Dragoon dirk but it doesn't have any stat
> increases. What I'm curious to know is where can this weapon be found?
> It
> looks just like a regular or a rusty dagger and mine is the only one I've
> ever seen. I forgot to ask the bard I got it from where he got it...so
> any
> help would be appreciated. I'm guessing that because it has the same
> graphic as a regular or rusty many people overlook this fine weapon.
>
>
>
>
